com.craftfire.commons.yaml
Class Settings

java.lang.Object
  com.craftfire.commons.yaml.Settings

public class Settings
extends Object

A class holding settings needed by YamlManager

isCaseSensitive

public boolean isCaseSensitive()
Returns the state of case-sensitive option (off by default).

If this option is on, node names will be case-sensitive.

Returns:
true if on, otherwise false

setCaseSensitive

public Settings setCaseSensitive(boolean caseSensitive)
Sets the state of case-sensitive option (off by default).

If this option is on, node names will be case-sensitive.

Parameters:
caseSensitive - true to turn on, false to turn off
Returns:
this

isMultiDocument

public boolean isMultiDocument()
NOT IMPLEMENTED YET! Checks the state of multi-document option (off by default).

This option allows to read multiple yaml documents from one file (separated by ---).

Returns:
true if on, false otherwise

setMultiDocument

public Settings setMultiDocument(boolean multiDocument)
NOT IMPLEMENTED YET! Sets the state of multi-document option (off by default).

This option allows to read multiple yaml documents from one file (separated by ---).

Parameters:
multiDocument - true to turn on, false to turn off
Returns:
this

getLogger

public LoggingManager getLogger()
Returns the logging manager to be used.

By default it's new LoggingManager("CraftFire.YamlManager", "[YamlManager]").

Returns:
the logging manager

setLogger

public Settings setLogger(LoggingManager logger)
Sets the logging manager to be used.

By default it's new LoggingManager("CraftFire.YamlManager", "[YamlManager]").

Parameters:
logger - the logging manager
Returns:
this
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if the logger is null
